value:
$WmMPID_ロキ,ch00_08_Loki_F_Normal,Face|Hee-hee... THAT went well.$k$p$EFace_Anger|Go on then, you darling monstrosity.
Destroy the world, and drag your
friends down with you...$k$p$WmMPID_トール,ch00_22_Tor_F_Normal,Face|Loki.$k$pWhat are you doing?$k$p$WmMPID_ロキ,ch00_08_Loki_F_Normal,Face|Now isn't THIS a rare treat? What
brings you here, my dear?$k$p$WmMPID_トール,ch00_22_Tor_F_Normal,Face|I scented one of your foul schemes.$k$p$WmMPID_ロキ,ch00_08_Loki_F_Normal,Face_Smile|It's so nice that you recognize
my genius... Even if you can't
quite grasp it.$k$p$EFace|These lost, defeated souls that
wander the realms... I just want
to give them a fighting chance.$k$pI had the thought to scoop them
up together. Into, well...a sort of
Hero, I suppose.$k$p$EFace_Cool|Do you have a better idea?
Well? Do you?$k$p$WmMPID_トール,ch00_22_Tor_F_Normal,Face_Anger|I mislike your attitude, Loki. Do not
speak ill of those who fell in battle.
For their ideals...they gave their all.$k$p$WmMPID_ロキ,ch00_08_Loki_F_Normal,Face|And so they did. Yet you'd see them
trapped here for eternity, drenched in
regret?$k$p$EFace_Smile|Soldiers would rather meet a much
more decisive end—don't you think?$k$p$WmMPID_トール,ch00_22_Tor_F_Normal,Face_Anger|You never learn, Loki. You must
know that I will be forced to report
this scheme.$k$p$WmMPID_ロキ,ch00_08_Loki_F_Normal,Face|Oh my. Bound by responsibility...
That's you all over, isn't it?$k$p$WmMPID_トール,ch00_22_Tor_F_Normal,Face_Cool|Don't toy with me, Loki.$k$pThere is work to be done, yet you
play, knowing full well your duties
are far too important to ignore.$k$p$WmMPID_ロキ,ch00_08_Loki_F_Normal,Face|Yes, yes, yes... I know. Everything
we do is for him... He who created
everything. Alfaðör.$k$p
